markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bottled Air](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3017)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=527" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 273 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Appearing to be an ordinary corked glass bottle, this item contains a limitless supply of fresh air. You must uncork the bottle with an Interact action before you can activate it. 

**Activate—Breath In** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))    **Effect** You draw a breath of air from the bottle. This allows you to breathe even in an airless or toxic environment. Air doesn't escape the mouth of the bottle, so leaving the open bottle in an airless environment doesn't change the environment.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bottled Air

text: <title level="1" right="Item 7" pfs="Standard" > Bottled Air Source GM Core pg. 273 2.0 Price 320 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk L --- Appearing to be an ordinary corked glass bottle, this item contains a limitless supply of fresh air. You must uncork the bottle with an Interact action before you can activate it. Activate—Breath In Single Action (manipulate) Effect You draw a breath of air from the bottle. This allows you to breathe even in an airless or toxic environment. Air doesn't escape the mouth of the bottle, so leaving the open bottle in an airless environment doesn't change the environment.
